name: Blue Cipher Ring
description: Item for online play. Puts the wearer in ready state to answer should someone in another world call for rescue. You will be summoned to their world as a hunter. When summoned to rescue another player, your objective will be to defeat the invader.
effect: Enables the wearer to answer calls for rescue

name: White Cipher Ring
description: Item for online play. Allows you to automatically request for a hunter from another world to come to your rescue when your world is invaded. (You may be unable to summon rescuers under certain circumstances). A lost mystic code, enchanted to take the form of a ring. One of the fetishes said to have been bestowed by the Two Fingers.
effect: When invaded, request the aid of a hunter.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Item for online play. Craftable item. Reveals cooperative and competitive multiplayer signs. Co-op summoning signs will be shown in gold, while hostile summoning signs will be shown in red. Multiplayer begins when you summon a player from another world through their sign.
effect: Reveals co-op and hostile summoning signs

name: Tarnished's Furled Finger
description: Item for online play. Creates a summon sign for cooperative multiplayer. Your objective will be to defeat the area boss of the world to which you were summoned. A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook. It is a relic of those who came before, left to help those who would come after.

name: Finger Severer
description: Item for online play.

name: Duelist's Furled Finger
description: Item for online play. Creates a summon sign for competitive multiplayer. Your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned. A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook. The bronze adornments are the mark of a duelist.

name: Memory Of Grace
description: A phantom vision of the first grace, which once guided the Tarnished to the Lands Between. Lose all runes and return to last site of grace at which you rested. It all repeats. Be seen by the Elden Ring. Become the Elden Lord.
effect: Lose all runes, return to last site of lost grace.

name: Tarnished's Wizened Finger
description: Item for online play. (Can also be used from the Messages menu.) Use to write messages. Your messages will be conveyed to other worlds, allowing other players to read them. A finger of corpse wax, so emaciated the bone is visible. It is a relic of those who came before, left to help those who would come after.

name: Taunter's Tongue
description: Item for online play. Lures in invaders. This allows your world to be invaded without any Furled Finger cooperators present, and it also shortens the interval between windows of opportunity for invasion. Additionally, enables the arrival of a second invader. (When two invaders are present, you will be limited to one cooperator.)

name: Bloody Finger
description: Item for online play. Attempts an invasion of another player's world. If successful, your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned. The nail of this finger is shot through with streaks of fresh, glistening blood. The finger's sickly pale skin feels nothing now, but the nail still aches with sweetest pain.
effect: Attempts invasion of other player's world.

name: Small Golden Effigy
description: Online multiplayer item. Sends a summon sign for cooperative multiplayer to a nearby summoning pool. In cooperative multiplayer, you will be summoned to another world to help defeat the area boss.
effect: Send co-operative sign to summoning pool

name: Small Red Effigy
description: Item for online play. Sends a competitive sign to a nearby summoning pool. In competitive multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned.
effect: Sends competitive sign to summoning pool

name: Festering Bloody Finger
description: Item for online play.
effect: Attempts invasion of other player's world

name: Smithing Stone [3]

name: Smithing Stone [2]
description: Stone used to smith a variety of armaments. A large shard found in plenty. Strengthens armaments up to +6. Smithing stone is found throughout the Lands Between, and mining galleries built to excavate it can be found everywhere

name: Grave Glovewort [1]

name: Flask Of Crimson Tears
description: A sacred flask modelled after a golden holy chalice that was once graced by a tear of life. Filled with crimson tears, this flask restores HP with use. Rest at a site of grace to replenish. It is said that a Finger Maiden will bestow two such chalices upon the chosen Tarnished when they meet.

name: Flask Of Cerulean Tears
description: A sacred flask modelled after a golden holy chalice that was once graced by a tear of life. Filled with cerulean tears, this flask restores FP with use. Rest at a site of grace to replenish. It is said that a Finger Maiden will bestow two such chalices upon the chosen Tarnished when they meet.

name: Scriptstone
description: Ruin fragment inscribed with letters.  Craftable item. Reveals additional messages from other worlds. Words are gregarious things, drawn to one another much as people are.
effect: Reveals more messages from other worlds

name: Holy Water Pot
description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. Enchanted by incantations of the Golden Order.
effect: Uses FP. Throw at enemies to inflict holy damage

name: Rainbow Stone
description: Ruin Fragment that has undergone some simple processing.
effect: Shines with colored light when placed, serving as a guide

name: Roped Fire Pot
description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
effect: Throw behind to inflict fire damage.

name: Rowa Raisin
description: Preparation of dried Rowa fruit.
effect: On horseback, feed to spectral steed to restore HP

name: Glowstone
description: Polished Ruin Fragment that shines brighter than a Rainbow Stone. Craftable item. Emits light from the location it is placed, illuminating surroundings. However, the effect is short-lived, and it lacks the diverse colors of rainbow stones. May serve some benefit in dark places, or at night.
effect: Emits a faint light from the location it is placed

name: Pauper's Rune
description: Grace that dwells within the inhabitants of The Lands Between; the lingering residue of gold. Use to gain a few runes. For all that they may be feeble things, these runes will act as nourishment for the development of any Tarnished. Provided a Finger Maiden can be found...
effect: Use to gain a few runes

name: Flask Of Wondrous Physick
description: A relic of the physick chemists, priests of the Erdtree. Harnesses the powers of crystal tears, which only form after the passage of many moons. Various specials effects are bestowed upon the drinker, dependent on the specific mixture of crystal tears. Rest at a site of grace to replenish. It is said that in the Lands Between, pools of crystal tears amass at the bases of Minor Erdtrees.

name: Immunizing Cured Meat
description: Cured strip of meat, dried out after pickling in a green medicinal solution. Craftable item. Temporarily boosts immunity Higher immunity helps to mitigate the buildup of various poisons and scarlet rot

name: Pickled Turtle Neck
description: Turtle neck meat, pickled in a bitter medicinal solution.

name: Fireproof Dried Liver
description: Cured animal liver, dried out after pickling in a flame-hued medical solution. Craftable item. Boosts fire damage negation for a short time, improving damage mitigation against attacks imbued with fire.
effect: Boosts  Fire Damage Negation for a short time.

name: Drawstring Fire Grease
description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of incendiary materials. Craftable item. A smallish lump with a short string attached. Quickly coats armament, inflicting fire damage. However, the effects are only brief.
effect: Quickly coats weapon, inflicting  Fire Damage

name: Fire Pot
description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. A cocktail of incendiary materials is sealed inside.
effect: Throw at enemies to inflict Fire Damage

name: Fire Grease
description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of incendiary materials. Craftable item. Coats armament, adding fire damage to attacks. The effect last only for a short time.

name: Neutralizing Boluses
description: Green boluses made from cave moss. Craftable item. Alleviates poison buildup and cures poison ailment. Poison accumulates gradually, coming into effect once the threshold is reached. Poison ailment lowers HP in steady increments for a period.
effect: Alleviates poison buildup and cures poison

name: Exalted Flesh
description: A lump of animal pickled in a medicinal solution mixed with fiery spices. Craftable item. Temporarily Boosts physical attack Considered a delicacy in the badlands, this invigorating repast was for the exclusive benefit of those who they called heroes.

name: Sleep Pot
description: Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot. Filled with the incantations of St. Trina. Consumes FP. Throw at enemy to release a purple, soporific haze. Like a lullaby, or a quagmire, it irresistibly draws its victims down into sleep. Sweet dreams.

name: Gold-pickled Fowl Foot
description: Four-toed foot of a fowl, pickled in a golden medicinal solution. Craftable item. Boosts the amount of runes obtained from defeating enemies for a certain duration Since old times, the needy would scrape the meat clean even from a fowl's claw.
effect: Boosts rune acquisition for a time (30%)

name: Dragon Heart
description: Dragon heart seized by a dragon tracker. It has a bizarre shape, mottled by gravel, and it continues to beat vivaciously. An offering used in the Dragon Communion. Consume a dragon's heart at the altar to make its power yours. While a terrible and savage-looking thing, the heart has a peculiar beauty to it.
effect: Gain power of the dragon at the Dragon Communion altar.

name: Throwing Dagger
description: Short dagger for throwing.
effect: Throw at enemies to inflict damage

name: Stimulating Boluses
description: Light-purple boluses made from cave moss. Craftable item. Alleviates buildup of sleep. Sleep accumulates gradually, causing sudden fogginess and loss of FP once the threshold is reached, even if it does not force the afflicted into true slumber. Take one of these into timely fashion to avoid such events.

name: Stanching Boluses
description: Red boluses made from cave moss Craftable item. Alleviates impending blood loss Blood loss escalates gradually, causing great damage once the threshold is reached. Take one of these in timely fashion to avoid such an event.

name: Lands Between Rune
description: Grace said to have once dwelled in the eyes of the inhabitants of the Lands Between; the lingering residue of gold.

name: Golden Seed
description: A golden seed, found at the base of an illusory tree.
effect: Increases Sacred Flask's number of uses

name: Bewitching Branch
description: Tree branch blessed with an incantation of unalloyed gold. Craftable item.
effect: Uses FP to charm pierced enemy

name: Boiled Prawn
description: Boiled prawn meat. A prime specimen of plump and moist meat. True connoisseurs know how to keep from over-salting.
effect: Boosts physical damage negation for a time

name: Explosive Stone
description: A small stone with a smoldering core.
effect: Explodes when thrown, inflicting Fire Damage

name: Starlight Shards

name: Glintstone Scrap
description: Piece of glintstone tinged with unstable magic. Found in crystal tunnels. Break gem, using FP to produce a magic bolt. Poor quality and thereby easily broken, a sorcerer wouldn't give it a second look.
effect: Break gem, using FP to produce a magic bolt.

name: Large Glintstone Scrap
description: Large piece of glintstone tinged with unstable magic. Found in crystal tunnels.
effect: Break gem and use FP to produce many magic bolts

name: Magic Grease

name: Remembrance Of The Grafted
description: Remembrance of Godrick, the Grafted, hewn into the Erdtree.
effect: Take the power of its namesake via Finger Reader

name: Rot Grease
description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of rotten materials.

name: Rune Arc
description: A shard of the shattered Elden Ring.
effect: Grants the blessing of an equipped rune upon use

name: Silver-pickled Fowl Foot
description: Four-toed foot of a fowl, pickled in a silvery medicinal solution.

name: Spellproof Dried Liver
description: Cured animal liver, dried out after pickling in a blue medicinal

name: Warming Stone
description: Ruin Fragment blessed with an incantation of the Two Fingers. Craftable item. Uses FP to generate warmth, continuously restoring the HP of those nearby. It's said that the Erdtree was once as warm as the gentle sun, and would gradually heal all who bathed in its rays.
effect: Uses FP to continuously heal nearby allies

description: Blessing of the Erdtree, worshiped in the churches of all lands; this

name: Drawstring Lightning Grease
description: Solidified grease made from a mixture of fulminating materials. Craftable item. A short string is attached to this lump.

Push someone in a privy; expect to get dung on your hands.
effect: Throw behind to cause buildup of deadly poison

effect: Uses FP. Throw to summon vengeful spirits.

name: Fetid Pot

Push someone in a privy; expect to get dung on your hands.
effect: Throw at enemies to cause deadly buildup of poison.

Your limbs are frozen stiff."

effect: Give to Sorceress Sellen to unlock Glintstone Cometshard and Star Shower

name: Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
description: Prayerbook of the capital's ancient dragon cult. A lost tome that never reached the Lands Between.
effect: Give to a learned cleric to acquire new incantations

name: Royal House Scroll
description: Sorcery scroll of the Carian royal family, the heads of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
effect: Give to a learned sorcerer to acquire new sorceries

name: Academy Scroll
description: Scroll of the Academy of Raya Lucaria, the glintstone sorcerers' place of study.
effect: Give to a learned sorcerer to acquire new sorceries

name: Whetstone Knife
description: Whetstone with a cipher inscription, made to look like a small knifeblade.
effect: Can add new battle arts and affinities to weapons

name: Glintstone Whetblade
description: Glintstone whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
effect: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon

name: Iron Whetblade
description: Iron whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
effect: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon

name: Whetstone Knife
description: Whetstone with a cipher inscription, made to look like a small knifeblade.
effect: Can add new battle arts and affinities to weapons

name: Black Whetblade
description: Black whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
effect: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon

name: Sancrified Whetblade
description: Sanctified whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife. When applying an affinity using physical or golden-type ashes of war, an additional affinity of sacred or lightning can be chosen.
effect: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon.

name: Map (limgrave, West)
description: Map of the western region of Limgrave. The demesne of Limgrave, far south of the Erdtree, is bordered to the northwest by the cliffs of Stormveil, and under its ever-clouded skies roll the great steppes of the pale lands.

name: Map (limgrave, East)
description: Map of the eastern region of Limgrave.

name: Map (weeping Peninsula)
description: Map of the Weeping Peninsula.

name: Map (weeping Peninsula)
description: Map of the Weeping Peninsula.

name: Map (liurnia, East)
description: Map of Liurnia's eastern region.

name: Map (liurnia, North)
description: Map of Liurnia's northern region.

name: Map (dragonbarrow)
description: Map of Dragonbarrow and environs.
effect: Reveals the region of Dragonbarrow on the map.

name: Map (liurnia, West)
description: Map of Liurnia's western region.
effect: Reveals the western portion of Liurnia on your map.

name: Map (ainsel River)
description: Map of Ainsel River and environs
effect: Map of Ainsel River and environs

name: Map (siofra River)
description: Map of Siofra River and environs
effect: Reveals the region of Siofra River on the map.

name: Map (altus Plateau)
description: Map of Altus Plateau and environs. The Altus Plateau, where the Erdtree's base can be found, contains the Royal Capital of Leyndell to the east, and Mt. Gelmir to the west. Scars from the Shattering remain apparent to this day.
effect: Reveals  Altus Plateau on your map

name: Map (leyndell, Royal Capital)
description: Map of the Royal Capital of Leyndell and environs.
effect: Reveals the region of Leyndell on the map.

name: Map (caelid)
description: Map of Caelid and environs.
effect: Reveals the region of Caelid on the map.

name: Map (mountaintops Of The Giants, West)
description: Map of Western Mountaintops of the Giants. Marching ground during the War against the Giants. They carved winding paths in the cliff walls right up to the summit, leading to the untrodden snow-laden region beyond.
effect: Map of Western Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Map (mountaintops Of The Giants, East)
description: Map of Eastern Mountaintops of the Giants. The remote, desolate eastern summit is the highest point in all the Lands Between, overlooking even the Flame Peak to the south.
effect: Map of Eastern Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Map (consecrated Snowfield)
description: Map of Consecrated Snowfield and environs. The route through this land, crossed east to west by a frozen river, leads to Miquella's Haligtree. This is the path taken by those unchosen, though it is a trial all the same.
effect: Map of Consecrated Snowfield and environs.

name: Map (lake Of Rot)
description: Map of Lake of Rot and environs. A great lake of standing water downstream of the Ainsel River. It is said that the divine essence of an outer god is sealed away in this land.
effect: Map of Lake of Rot and environs.

name: Note (land Squirts)
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant. Contains information about land squirts.

name: Map (deeproot Depths)
description: Map of Deeproot Depths and environs. At the very depths of the Erdtree's majestic roots lies the source of the Ainsel and the Siofra rivers. Here too begins the network of Greattree roots that spread throughout the Lands Between.
effect: Revels Deeproot Depths and environs on your map

name: Note (stonedigger Trolls)
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant. Contains information about stonedigger trolls.

name: Note (flask Of Wondrous Physick)
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant.

name: Note (waypoint Ruins)
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant.

name: Ruptured Crystal Tear
description: A special crystallization formed within a tear of life over the course of many moons. Causes concoction to explode when taken in mixed physick. A dangerous form of crystal tear which possesses absolutely no medicinal qualities. A lesson said to be learned the hard way for some; faith can be a volatile matter, after all.
effect: Causes concoction to explode in mixed physick

name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Temporarily boosts stamina in mixed physick

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear
description: A special crystallization formed over the course of many moons within a tear of life, a blessing of the Erdtree. Can be mixed in a flask of wondrous physick. The resulting concoction restores 20 half of one's max FP.
effect: Restores half of total FP in mixed physick.

name: Cerulean Hidden Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Eliminates all FP consumption in mixed physick

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction restores half of one's maximum HP.
effect: Restores half of total HP in mixed physick

name: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's
effect: Steadily restores HP for a time in mixed physick

name: Faith-knot Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction temporarily boosts one's faith.
effect: Temporarily boosts faith in mixed physick

name: Strength-knot Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Temporarily boosts strength in mixed physick

name: Opaline Bubbletear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Significantly negates damage in mixed physick

name: Spiked Cracked Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Enhances charged attacks for a time in mixed physick

name: Dexterity-knot Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Temporarily boosts dexterity in mixed physick

name: Lightning-shrouding Cracked Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Temporarily boosts lightning attacks in mixed physick

name: Magic-shrouding Cracked Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Temporarily boosts magic attacks in mixed physick

name: Winged Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Temporarily reduces equip load in mixed physick

name: Holy-shrouding Cracked Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Temporarily boosts holy attacks in mixed physick

name: Twiggy Cracked Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Briefly stop rune loss on death in mixed physick

name: Leaden Hardtear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Temporarily boosts poise in mixed physick

name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction temporarily raises one's maximum HP.
effect: Temporarily boosts max HP in mixed physick

name: Greenburst Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction gradually restores stamina recovery speed.
effect: Temporarily boosts stamina recovery speed in mixed physick.

name: Speckled Hardtear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction temporarily raises all resistances and heals all status ailments.
effect: Boosts resistance and heals status in mixed physick.

name: Flame-shrouding Cracked Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction temporarily boosts the power of one's fire attacks.
effect: Temporarily boosts the power of one's fire attacks.

name: Crimson Bubbletear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction automatically heals one's HP in the moment before death. However, this effect only occurs once, and will expire after a certain duration.
effect: Restores HP when near death in mixed physick.

name: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction converts incoming damage into recovered HP instead. However, physical damage cannot be converted. This effect is only brief and will quickly expire.
effect: Converts damage received into HP in mixed physick.

name: Thorny Cracked Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction makes consecutive attacks grow stronger the longer they continue. However, the effect lasts only for a short time.
effect: Makes consecutive attacks grow stronger in mixed physick.

name: Stonebarb Cracked Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Make attacks more likely to break enemy stances in a mixed physick

name: Windy Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction increases the effectiveness of dodgerolls for a certain duration. However, damage taken is also increased during the concoction's effect.
effect: Enhances dodge rolls for a time in mixed physick

name: Opaline Hardtear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick. The resulting concoction temporarily boosts all forms of damage negation.
effect: Temporarily boosts all damage negations in physick

name: Purifying Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the age where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground. Can be mixed in the Flask of Wonderous Physick. The resulting conction purifies the curse from Mohg, Lord of Blood's terrifying rite of blood.
effect: Purifies the Lord of Blood's curse in a mixed physick

name: Aeonian Butterfly
description: A butterfly with withered, scarlet wings found in the swamp of Aeonia. Material used for crafting items.

name: Albinauric Bloodclot
description: The thick, coagulated blood of the Ablinaurics. Material used for crafting items.

name: Intelligence-knot Crystal Tear
description: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
effect: Temporarily boosts intelligence in mixed physick.

name: Altus Bloom
description: A golden-tingerd flower from a succulent plant that blooms on the Altus Plateau. Material used for crafting items.

name: Arteria Leaf
description: Dark red leaves with thick, swollen veins. Material used for crafting items. Exceedingly rare to find. A faint pulse can be felt in the veins. Stirs the blood, providing an enlivening effect.

name: Beast Liver
description: The fresh liver of a beast; a luscious fruit of life. Material used for crating items. Found by hunting herbivorous beast. Dried liver boost damage negation.

name: Beast Blood
description: Fresh beast blood, glinting with gold. Material used for crafting items.

name: Bloodrose
description: Blood-slick roses that bloom in festering blood. Material used for crafting items.

name: Blood-tainted Excrement
description: The bloody excrement of a carnivorous beast. Material used for crafting items. Found in the land of the new dynasty. Mixed inside with half-digested flesh are dense colonies of tiny eggs of unknown but assuredly revolting origin.

name: Budding Cave Moss
description: Faintly luminescent moss that grows in dark caves, speckled with tiny, yellow flowers. Material used for crafting items.

name: Cave Moss
description: Faintly luminescent moss that grows in dark caves. Material used in crafting items. A fundamental ingredient for medicinal boluses.
obtainedFrom: Gives off pale light in dark caverns.

name: Cracked Crystal
description: A cracked, impure, degraded, and altogether unremarkable crystal. Material used for crafting items

name: Crystal Cave Moss
description: Faintly luminescent moss that grows in dark caves, laced with fine crystals. Material used for crafting items.

name: Budding Horn
description: A rarely-seen specimen of a young, budding horn. Material used for crafting items. Found by hunting herbivorous beasts.

name: Crab Eggs
description: Eggs of lare crabs which dwell in the shallows. Materials used for crafting items.

name: Cracked Pot
description: This empty pot somehow mends itself when broken.
effect: Container required for crafting cracked pot items

name: Ritual Pot
description: This empty pot somehow mends itself when broken. Special item with greater durability than a cracked pot.
effect: Container required for crafting ritual pot items

name: Crystal Bud
description: A young plant, crystalized before it could mature. Material used for crafting items.

name: Dewkissed Herba
description: A herb that grows in the false night in and around the Eternal City. Material used for crafting items.

name: Eye Of Yelough
description: A shrub fruit bursting with ripened pulp. Material used for crafting items.

name: Erdleaf Flower
description: A dusky-yellow flower that has started to fade and wilt. Material used for crafting items.

name: Faded Erdleaf Flower
description: An Erdleaf flower that has faded into a plate scarlet, found blooming in rotten lands. Material used for crafting items.

name: Fire Blossom
description: A half-ashen and smoldering flower that blooms on the mountaintops of the Giants. Material used for crafting items.

name: Flight Pinion
description: Flight feather of a bird of prey. Material used for crafting items. Commonly used for arrow fletchings.

name: Formic Rock
description: Rock formed from solidified giant ant venom. Highly acidic. Material used for crafting items.

name: Four-toed Fowl Foot
description: Foot of a four-toed fowl. Material used for crafting items. In the Lands Between, having three digits is seen as a bad omen. As such, the rarer four-toed fowl's is a gift of great luck indeed.

name: Fulgurbloom
description: Yellow flower that grows in lightning-struck lands. Material used for crafting items. Imbued with traces of lightning's essence.

name: Glintstone Firefly
description: A firefly whose glowing tail has hardened into glintstone, widely found in Liurnia Lake. Material used for crafting items.

name: Glintstone Scrap
description: Piece of glintstone tinged with unstable magic. Found in crystal tunnels. Break gem, using FP to produce a magic bolt. Poor quality and thereby easily broken, a sorcerer wouldn't give it a second look.
effect: Break gem, using FP to produce a magic bolt.

name: Gold Firefly
description: Firefly that gives off a golden light. Material used in crafting items. Found near bodies of water close to Minor Erdtrees. The light of fireflies is believed to have an alluring magic. Golden light is considered to invite runes.

name: Gold-tinged Excrement
description: Someone's excrement. It has a golden tinge. Material used for crafting items. Often hidden in woods and thickets. Gold-tinged excrement is a highly stable substance; it doesn't dry out, nor does it lose its customary warmth or scent. For better or for worse, it remains as it is.
obtainedFrom: Often hidden in woods and thickets.

name: Golden Centipede
description: The golden, desiccated remains of a centipede.

name: Golden Dung
description: Someone's excrement. It has a golden tinge. Material used for crafting items. Gold-tinged excrement is a highly stable substance; it doesn't dry out, nor does it lose its customary warmth or scent. For better or for worse, it remains as it is.

name: Golden Rowa
description: A Rowa fruit tinted with gold. Material used for crafting items.

name: Golden Sunflower
description: A golden sunflower that grows facing the Erdtree. Material used for crafting items. Found near Minor Erdtrees.

name: Grave Violet
description: A purple flower than blooms in graveyards. Material used for crafting items.
obtainedFrom: At Liurnia of The Lakes' graves.

name: Gravel Stone
description: A small clump of sharp, pointed stones. Material used for crafting items.

name: Great Dragonfly Head
description: Head of a large dragonfly. Material used for crafting items. Long believed to have the ability to neutralize poisons.

name: Herba
description: Evergreen leaves that give off a faith light. Material used for crafting items. This very common medicinal plant can be found in thickets and elsewhere.

name: Hidden Plumage
description: Rarely-seen dark plumage found inside the wing. Material used for crafting items. Death's bearers were once said to have taken the form of birds, symbolized by these black feathers.

name: Human Bone Shard
description: Fragment of bone with dun mottling. Material used for crafting items. Found by hunting Those Who Live in Death.

name: Living Jar Shard
description: A fragment of a living jar, hardened after its death. Material used for crafting items.

name: Lump Of Flesh
description: A lump of beast flesh filled with rich juices. Material used for crafting items. Found by hunting carnivorous beast. Meat suitable for a rustic feast.

name: Land Octopus Ovary
description: Puffy, milky white ovary of a land octopus. Material used for crafting items. Land octopuses eat humans in order to bear young, and theirs is the blood that runs through these ovaries.

name: Melted Mushroom
description: A mushroom that grows in the false night in and around the Eternal City. Material used for crafting items.

name: Miquella's Lily
description: A delicate water lily of unalloyed gold that has started to fade and wilt. Material used for crafting items. Exeedingly rare to find.

name: Miranda Powder
description: Pollen from a man-eating miranda flower. Material used for crafting items.

name: Moon Egg
description: Owl eggs that will never hatch. Material used for crafting items. Prized as a symbol of the most sublime slumber.

name: Old Fang
description: A rarely-seen specimen of beast fang.

name: Mushroom
description: A fungal growth that thrives in damp thickets and elsewhere. Material used for crafting items. Its thick, spongy flesh makes it a key component in throwing pots.
obtainedFrom: Thrives in damp thickets and elsewhere.

name: Perfume Bottle
description: Glass bottles used by perfumers. Used to seal various scent compounds.
effect: Container required for crafting perfume items

name: Poisonbloom
description: Flower that grows in toxic terrain. Material used for crafting items. Poisonous, but may also provide the cure.

name: Nascent Butterfly
description: An arcane butterfly with translucent wings. Material used for crafting items. Exceedingly rare to find.

name: Rimed Crystal Bud
description: A young plant, frozen into a crystal before it could mature. Material used for crafting items.

name: Rimed Rowa
description: A berry-like fruit, thought to be the original strain of Rowa. Material used for crafting items. Found in frigid highlands.

name: Root Resin
description: Resin secreted from the roots of the Great tree. Material used in crafting items. The roots of the Great tree drive far and wide through the earth of the Lands Between. They were once entwined with the roots of the Erdtree, or so they say.
obtainedFrom: Secreted from the roots of the Greattree. Can also be found near trees on the surface.

name: Rowa Fruit
description: Berry-like red fruits that grow in shrubs. Material used for crafting items. Easily found everywhere in the Lands Between, it is primarily used in preserved foods.
obtainedFrom: Easily found everywhere in the Lands Between.

name: Ruin Fragment
description: Stone fragment found near places where ruins have fallen from the sky. Can be used for crafting, or simply for throwing at enemies. These shards of stone are believed to have once been part of a temple in the sky. They glow with a faint light from within.

name: Sacramental Bud
description: An immature bud containing fresh blood. Material used for crafting items.

name: Sanctuary Stone
description: A rare piece of stone fragment found near places where ruins have fallen from the sky. Material used for crafting items.

name: Slumbering Egg
description: Owl eggs that will never hatch. Material used for crafting items.

name: Smoldering Butterfly
description: An eternally burning butterfly found near wildfires and elsewhere. Material used for crafting items. Serves as the kindling for a number of items.

name: String
description: Boasting no special qualities, this is merely a goodly length of string.

name: Silver Firefly
description: Firefly that gives off a silvery light. Material used in crafting items. Found near bodies of cold water untouched by sunlight. The light of fireflies is believed to have an alluring magic. Silver light is considered to invite riches.
obtainedFrom: Found near cold waters untouched by sunlight.

name: Sliver Of Meat
description: A slice of thinly carved beast flesh. Material used for crating items. Found by hunting herbivorous beast. The dried meat toughens the constitution.

name: Strip Of White Flesh
description: Thin strips of flesh taken from a bloodless creature. Material used for crafting items. The dried meat toughens the constitution, boosting resistance. It's known for its long-lasting effect.
obtainedFrom: Found by hunting creatures devoid of blood.

name: Tarnished Golden Sunflower
description: A large flower that blooms facing the Erdtree. Material used for crafting items. Found near Minor Erdtrees.

name: Toxic Mushroom
description: A mushroom covered in toxic mold that grows in rotten lands. Material used for crafting items.

name: Trina's Lily
description: A pale purple water lily that is on the verge of wilting. Material used for crafting items. Exceedingly rare to find. A symbol of faith in St. Trina. Dulls the senses, preventing agitation.

name: Thin Beast Bones
description: Thin, hard beast bones. Material used for crafting items. Found by hunting beasts.

name: Turtle Neck Meat
description: A splendid, lengthy cut of turtle neck meat. Material used for crafting items. Turtle meat is said to boost virility, but none in the Lands Between seem to have much appetite for it these days. In Lands Between, the urge to reproduce has waned long ago.

name: Volcanic Stone
description: A smoldering rock containing hot gas.

name: Yellow Ember
description: An ember taken from an eye socket of a corpse. Material used for crafting items.

name: Hefty Beast Bone
description: Thick, solid beast bones. Material used for crafting items. Found by hunting particularly large beasts. Commonly Used to make disposable weapons.

name: Silver Tear Husk
description: A hardened husk shed by a formless life form known as the Silver Tear, found in and around the Eternal City. Material used for crafting items. The Silver Tear makes mockery of life, reborn again and again into imitation. Perhaps, one day, it will be reborn a lord...

name: Stormhawk Feather
description: A feather from a hawk that lived as one with the storms. Material used for crafting items. These feathers, enveloped in swirling winds, are often used for arrow fletching.
